definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_num_tag_set"><value name="entry"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">PRESS_Z</field></block></value><value name="list"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ForgeData</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="num"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_num_tag_set"><value name="entry"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">skill</field></block></value><value name="list"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ForgeData</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="num"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">skill</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @s run effect give @s jujutsucraft:cursed_technique</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">300</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
